jei.goe.category.pedestal_crafting.descr: Place items on Pedestals to craft magical items. The center item goes on the Pedestal, and the surrounding ingredients are placed on nearby Pedestals within range.
jei.goe.category.wand_catalyst.descripti: Use any wand to transform blocks into valuable materials. Right-click a block with a wand to perform the transformation.
jei.goe.info.pedestal_crafting.title: How to Use Pedestal Crafting
jei.goe.info.pedestal_crafting.text:
1. Place the center item on a Pedestal
2. Place surrounding ingredients on nearby Pedestals
3. Right-click the center Pedestal to craft
4. All items within the search radius will be consumed
jei.goe.info.wand_catalyst.title: How to Use Wand Catalyst
jei.goe.info.wand_catalyst.text:
1. Hold any wand in your hand
2. Right-click on the target block
3. The block will be consumed and items will drop
4. The wand will take durability damage
